meanings.definition: The most interesting or exciting part of an event or period of time.
meanings.sent1: The highlights of the movie were the thrilling car chase scenes.
meanings.sent2: The highlights of the party were the delicious food and fun games.
meanings.sent3: The highlights of the school play were the unexpected bloopers that made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The highlights of the book shone brightly, drawing readers in with their excitement.
meanings.sent5: The highlights of the concert were so vivid that they stayed in the audience's memory for days.

meanings.sent1: The speaker highlights the importance of recycling in his speech.
meanings.sent2: She always highlights the key points in her presentations to make them stand out.
meanings.sent3: The comedian highlights the absurdity of everyday life in his jokes.
meanings.sent4: The artist's use of color highlights the beauty of the landscape.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's enthusiasm highlights the joy of learning for her students.

meanings.definition: A lighter section of hair created by dyeing or bleaching.
meanings.sent1: She decided to add blonde highlights to her brown hair for a new look.
meanings.sent2: The stylist recommended adding caramel highlights to complement her skin tone.
meanings.sent3: The cat's fur looked like it had natural highlights in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The golden highlights in her hair shimmered like sunlight on water.
meanings.sent5: The highlights in her hair made her feel like a new person, full of brightness and energy.
